H0.text: In what modern-day country was the Norse settlement of Vinland. United States

H1.text: In what modern-day country was the Norse settlement of Vinland. Greenland

H2.text: In what modern-day country was the Norse settlement of Vinland. Russia

H3.text: In what modern-day country was the Norse settlement of Vinland. ᑲᓇᑕ

A4.text: the discovery of butternuts at the site implies that the Norse explored Vinland further to the south, at least as far as St. Lawrence River and parts of New Brunswick

A5.text: Charting the overlap of the limits of wild vine and wild salmon habitats, as well as nautical clues from the sagas, Wahlgren indicates a location in Maine or New Brunswick
